verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with their armies <S%H6635><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> their goings <S%H4161><s%> out according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> by the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are their journeys <S%H4550><s%> according to their goings <S%H4161><s%> out.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the passover <S%H6453><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out with an high <S%H7311><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

For the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> among them: on their gods <S%H430><s%> also the LORD <S%H3068><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses, <S%H7486><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Etham, <S%H864><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Etham, <S%H864><s%> and turned <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Baalzephon: <S%H1189><s%> and they pitched <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Migdol. <S%H4024><s%>

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H8432><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Etham, <S%H864><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Marah. <S%H4785><s%>

And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Marah, <S%H4785><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Elim: <S%H362><s%> and in Elim <S%H362><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> fountains <S%H5869><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten palm <S%H8558><s%> trees; and they pitched <S%H2583><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin. <S%H5512><s%>
And they took <S%H5265><s%> their journey <S%H5265><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dophkah. <S%H1850><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Dophkah, <S%H1850><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Alush. <S%H442><s%>

And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Alush, <S%H442><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> was no <S%H3808><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Kibrothhattaavah. <S%H6914><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibrothhattaavah, <S%H6914><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Rithmah. <S%H7575><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rithmah, <S%H7575><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Rimmonparez. <S%H7428><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rimmonparez, <S%H7428><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Rissah. <S%H7446><s%>
And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rissah, <S%H7446><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Kehelathah. <S%H6954><s%>
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Kehelathah, <S%H6954><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Shapher. <S%H8234><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Shapher, <S%H8234><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Haradah. <S%H2732><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Haradah, <S%H2732><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Makheloth. <S%H4722><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Makheloth, <S%H4722><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Tahath. <S%H8480><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Tahath, <S%H8480><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> at Tarah. <S%H8646><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Tarah, <S%H8646><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Mithcah. <S%H4989><s%>
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Mithcah, <S%H4989><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Hashmonah. <S%H2832><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Hashmonah, <S%H2832><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Moseroth. <S%H4149><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Moseroth, <S%H4149><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Benejaakan. <S%H1142><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Benejaakan, <S%H1142><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Horhagidgad. <S%H2735><s%>
And they went <S%H5265><s%> from Horhagidgad, <S%H2735><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Jotbathah. <S%H3193><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Jotbathah, <S%H3193><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Ebronah. <S%H5684><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Ebronah, <S%H5684><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> at Eziongaber. <S%H6100><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Eziongaber, <S%H6100><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up into <S%H413><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

And king <S%H4428><s%> Arad <S%H6166><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of the coming <S%H935><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Zalmonah. <S%H6758><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Zalmonah, <S%H6758><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Punon. <S%H6325><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Punon, <S%H6325><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth. <S%H88><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth, <S%H88><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Ijeabarim, <S%H5863><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from Iim, <S%H5864><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Dibongad. <S%H1769><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Dibongad, <S%H1769><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Almondiblathaim. <S%H5963><s%>
And they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Almondiblathaim, <S%H5963><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Nebo. <S%H5015><s%>

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
And they pitched <S%H2583><s%> by Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from Bethjesimoth <S%H1020><s%> even to Abelshittim <S%H63><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> you are passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%>

Then you shall drive <S%H3423><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and destroy <S%H6><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their pictures, <S%H4906><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their molten <S%H4541><s%> images, and quite pluck <S%H8045><s%> down <S%H8045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their high <S%H1116><s%> places:
And you shall dispossess <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of the land, <S%H776><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: for I have given <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

And you shall divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> among your families: <S%H4940><s%> and to the more <S%H7227><s%> you shall give the more <S%H7235><s%> inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and to the fewer <S%H4592><s%> you shall give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> every man's inheritance shall be in the place where <S%H413><s%> his lot <S%H1486><s%> falls; <S%H3318><s%> according to the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> you shall inherit. <S%H5157><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> you will not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; then it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that those which <S%H834><s%> you let remain <S%H3498><s%> of them shall be pricks <S%H7899><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and shall vex <S%H6887><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you dwell. <S%H3427><s%>
Moreover it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that I shall do <S%H6213><s%> to you, as I thought <S%H1819><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to them.
